name: Yggdrasil (AntonyMo, Arthadanel, darkenezy, sevenzik)
description:
Provide enough resources for a seed to plant and grow The Great Yggdrasil!

You need to grow new Yggdrasil to hold the sky. But can Yggdrasil grow anywhere?

- Use drag-and-drop to plant flowers which can affect resources in the soil.

- Think carefully, or it will be impossible to plant the seed of The Great Yggdrasil. (Until you restart the level :^)

- Grow the Great Yggdrasil to finish the level!

By Imminent Disaster Team

We’ll appreciate any feedback :^)
